VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Garcia Global?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Garcia Global is arc {AtkinsonExpress}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Potter.com?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Potter.com is arc {AtkinsonExpress}.

Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between AtkinsonExpress and Garcia Global in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between AtkinsonExpress and Garcia Global is {62}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between JohnsonLLC.com and GillespieShop in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between JohnsonLLC.com and GillespieShop is {208}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from JohnsonLLC.com?
SC.A: The total flow output from JohnsonLLC.com is {208}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by JohnsonLLC.com?
SC.A: The total flow input by JohnsonLLC.com is {225}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 192? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {208} from {JohnsonLLC.com} to {GillespieShop}, a flow of {225} from {GillespieShop} to {JohnsonLLC.com}, a flow of {213} from {Garcia Global} to {GillespieShop}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 90? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {38} from {Garcia Global} to {AtkinsonExpress}, a flow of {62} from {AtkinsonExpress} to {Garcia Global}, a flow of {63} from {GillespieShop} to {Potter.com}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 119 and 145? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {120} from {Garcia Global} to {Potter.com}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from JohnsonLLC.com to GillespieShop or from AtkinsonExpress to Garcia Global?
NC.A: The flow from {JohnsonLLC.com} to {GillespieShop} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from GillespieShop to JohnsonLLC.com, from Potter.com to GillespieShop, or from Garcia Global to Potter.com?
NC.A: The flow from {GillespieShop} to {JohnsonLLC.com} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {AtkinsonExpress}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {GillespieShop} and {JohnsonLLC.com}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc JohnsonLLC.com, Arc GillespieShop, Arc Garcia Global, Arc Potter.com, Arc AtkinsonExpress}.
